verse.name: v1
verse.lines: You want to be real, newline You want to be empty inside, newline You want to be someone laying down your pride, newline You want to be someone someday, newline Then Lay it all Down before the King.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: You want to be whole, newline You want to have purpose inside, newline You want to have virtue and purify your mind newline You want to be set free today then lay it all down before the king.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: This is my Desire, newline This is my Return, newline This is my Desire, newline To be Used by You.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: You want to be Real, newline You want to be emptied inside, newline And I know my heart is to feel you near, newline And I know my life is to do your will.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: It's to do your will, newline It's to do your will,

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: All my life I have seen where you've taken me, newline Beyond all I have hoped and there's more left unseen, newline There's not much I can do to repay all you've done, newline So I give my hands to Use.
